Configuration File Examples (XML, JSON, and INI-based)
Configuring the Handler

XML-based Configuration File

1 <configuration>
2  <B3BOE>
3  <SessionId>100350121</SessionId>
4  <EnteringFirm>915</EnteringFirm>
5  <AccessKey>aasdf3993bvuO</AccessKey>
6  <TradingSystem.Name>OnixS-2</TradingSystem.Name>
7  <TradingSystem.Version>1.1.2</TradingSystem.Version>
8  </B3BOE>
9 </configuration>

JSON-based Configuration File

1 {
2  "B3BOE":
3  {
4  "SessionId": "100350121",
5  "EnteringFirm": "915",
6  "AccessKey": "aasdf3993bvuO",
7  "TradingSystem.Name": "OnixS-2",
8  "TradingSystem.Version": "1.1.2",
9  }
10 }

INI-based Configuration File

1 SessionId=100350121
2 EnteringFirm=915
3 AccessKey=aasdf3993bvuO
4 TradingSystem.Name=OnixS-2
5 TradingSystem.Version=1.1.2
